./v4l2lepton -v /dev/video42 -d /dev/spidev0.0 --type 3 --out rgb --colormap 3 --spi-mhz 20 -V# v4l2lepton (vendored & modified)

This directory contains a modified copy of `v4l2lepton` from:
https://github.com/groupgets/LeptonModule/tree/master/software/v4l2lepton

- License: GPLv3 (see COPYING and ORIGIN.md)
- Modifications: see ORIGIN.md

## Run example
./v4l2lepton -v /dev/video42 -d /dev/spidev0.0 --type 3 --out rgb --colormap 3 --spi-mhz 24 -V
